snippet.textDisplay: Talking beside origin of covid............ living with covid isn't easy currently I'm in Sri Lanka 🇱🇰 an developing island nation, for some reason we didn't handle well however since August 3 a day 200 people dying without proper medication, a new variant spreading very fast..........I was in a government operated hospital treating my father since August 14 , it's a disaster I was  witnessed with poor soul departing each day I visited the hospital .........I was emotionally challenged about the chaotic scene....... Appreciate the medical front liner's.........
